import React from 'react' import styles from '../css/brushDisplay.module.css' import '../css/general.css' import SideBar from './SideBar' export default function BrushDisplay({brush, textAlignment = 'left'}) { return (
{brush.title}

{brush.description}

{textAlignment == 'left' &&

{brush.writeUp}

} {textAlignment == 'right' && }
{textAlignment == 'right' &&

{brush.writeUp}

} {textAlignment == 'left' && }
) }
